export const getThemeStyles=isDark=>{return{// Background colors
bgPrimary:isDark?'#111827':'#f8fafc',bgSecondary:isDark?'#1f2937':'white',bgTertiary:isDark?'#374151':'#f3f4f6',// Text colors
textPrimary:isDark?'#f9fafb':'#111827',textSecondary:isDark?'#d1d5db':'#6b7280',textTertiary:isDark?'#9ca3af':'#9ca3af',// Border colors
borderPrimary:isDark?'#374151':'#e5e7eb',borderSecondary:isDark?'#4b5563':'#d1d5db',// Component colors
cardBg:isDark?'#1f2937':'white',cardBorder:isDark?'#374151':'#e5e7eb',inputBg:isDark?'#374151':'white',inputBorder:isDark?'#4b5563':'#d1d5db',// Status colors (remain the same)
status:{backlog:'#6b7280',todo:'#3b82f6','in-progress':'#f59e0b',done:'#10b981',active:'#10b981',archived:'#6b7280',completed:'#3b82f6'},// Priority colors (remain the same)
priority:{low:'#84cc16',medium:'#eab308',high:'#f97316',urgent:'#ef4444'}};};
